New Records: Jarren Duran has 78 extra-base hits, which is the fourth-most in Red Sox history for a single season as a leadoff hitter.
Key Match Events: The Boston Red Sox beat the Detroit Tigers 7-5 in extra innings.
Pre-Game Insights: The game was crucial for the Red Sox as they were 3.5 games back of the third and final wild card spot in the American League.
Post-Match Reflections: Jarren Duran's performance was highlighted, as he went 3-for-5 with two doubles and a home run.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox and Tigers will play again on Saturday night.
Others: Nick Pivetta will get the ball for Boston while Tarik Skubal pitches for the Tigers in the next game.
